wikipedia_page.main: Chris Gilmour is a British sculptor based in Manchester. Gilmour is known for his sculptures that use cardboard to recreate everyday objects in life-size scale.

response: The series was won by a British driver for the second time in three years, with James Winslow victorious after a season long battle with Leanne Tander, who was runner up by only a few points for the second year in a row. Chris Gilmour won the National Class from Irish driver Lee Farrell, while Andrew Mill clinched the Trophy Class with a round in hand.
